useCase.name: Managing Employee Information
useCase.description: As a user, I want to manage the information of employees within different departments of a company.

preconditions.precondition: The system is running and all necessary classes and objects are instantiated.

successEndConditions.condition: All employee information is successfully managed and displayed.

failureEndConditions.condition: Any error that occurs during the management process is appropriately handled.

useCase.trigger: User initiates the process by running the main function.

mainSequence.step: User starts the application by invoking the main function.
The main function triggers the execution of managing department information.
Company, HR, IT, Development, QA, and all employee objects are instantiated.
Employees with their respective budgets are added to HR, Development, and QA departments.
The system prints the name and budget of the company.
The system displays the total number of workers in the company.
